talk.chat:
Priest Ranton:
Why would a Warrior be interested in the teaching of Einhasad? There are plenty of other gods out there...

Priest Ranton:
What do you know about Devil's Isle? I heard a rumor that the ghost of Great Pirate Zaken still haunts it... Our temple is definitely not happy with that... This is all due to those greedy adventurers seeking treasure there -- they must have awakened Zaken's spirit. Well, they paid the price for their avarice; not a one of them returned. If you choose to set foot on that accursed island, take great care. Only the light of Einhasad can vanquish so powerful an undead...
Learn skills.
Ask about Skill Transfer.
Ask about Skill Enchanting.
